post:
Hey :)

As I promised I opened a KS flash sale. **Only for LET users** because its only available through order link, not visible on website :)

It will let it 48h maximum starting now.

**How to order ?**

- Go to kimsufi website (whatever the language)
- Try to order a server.
- When you are on the order funnel, checkout URL link
- At the end of the URL link, you have the reference of the product
Example:  https://www.kimsufi.com/en/order/kimsufi.xml?reference=**1801sk18**
Modify it then refresh : https://www.kimsufi.com/en/order/kimsufi.xml?reference=**1801sk181**

**Servers KS-7**  
**References to order** => 1801sk181 (FR Datacenter) / 1804sk181 (CA Datacenter)
Intel i3-2130
2c/4t @ 3.4GHz
8GB DDR3 1333 MHz
2TB

€14.99 ex. VAT
**New price: €8.99 ex. VAT (=40% off)**
(+ € 9.99 setup fee)

------------------------

**Servers KS-10**  
**References to order** => 1901sk21 (FR Datacenter) / 1904sk21 (CA Datacenter)
Intel  i5-2300 	
4c/4t 	2,8GHz 	
16GB DDR3 1333 MHz 	  
2TB HDD

€18.99 ex. VAT
**New price: €12.99 ex. VAT  (=32% off)**
(+ € 9.99 setup fee)

Enjoy
